mapper.select: select g.goods_name as goodsName, g.goods_unit as goodsUnit, g.goods_img as goodsImg, oi.`id` as id, oi.`goods_price` as goodsPrice, oi.`goods_num` as goodsNum, ge.`level` as level, ge.`user_note` as userNote, ge.`create_time` as createTime from `order_item` oi left join `goods` g on oi.`goods_id` = g.`id` left join `goods_evaluate` ge on oi.`id` = ge.`order_item_id` where oi.`order_id` = #{orderId}
